extendedInfo.description: This application is a simplest and most effective way to extend phone battery life. It auto-disables WiFi and cellular data network connection when screen turned off. Main features for DEMO version:- Easy configuration- Shortcuts to manually enable/disable WiFi and Cellular network connections. - Option to use widget that shows battery charge on home screen.For More features (different battery saver modes, option to show battery charge % indicator on status bar) get the Full version available on Google Play market.Application does not show any commercial banners, does not contain any spyware and malware functionality.

reviews.title: Works but shuts WiFi off randomly
reviews.comment: This app works well, when it  works. It keeps WiFi on for me when I\'m using my phone then randomly shuts it off while my screen is on. Please fix this!!
reviews.author: Ryan F

reviews.title: 1 imp. Feature missing
reviews.comment: It disconnects the internet while downloading something,when the screen is off..it would enable the internet while downloading
reviews.author: gaurav bhandari

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work all the time.
reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t turn wifi back on or data if left for about 20 mins. I\'m running gb on sgs2. Thought this app was so simple aswell. I just force close and it re starts the app. Annoying though.
reviews.author: Kevin Hutchison

reviews.title: Needs more options
reviews.comment: Makes my battery last but just need more options
reviews.author: Chanel Haggins

reviews.title: FANTASTIC
reviews.comment: Pleasantly surprised at how good it works. Simple, fuss free and effective. No other features except the control of wifi and data but it does save a LOT of juice when used.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I have recommended this app to several people. Before downloading Long Battery Life DEMO my phone (Xperia Arc S) would have about 30% battery left after 12 hours, now it has about 70% left after the same time and usage and over 50% left after 24 hours. There are lots of other similar apps around, but this was the only one I could find that didn\'t ask for permissions for lots of things I don\'t believe such an app should need.   If the paid version had an option to connect data for a couple of minutes per hour for synching I\'d buy it, for now the free version suits my needs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No customizability
reviews.comment: Nice app. Does what it says. Would give an extra star when I get some customizability (for free). Is it possible to control just wifi with this app? I want to keep data always ON.
reviews.author: Siddhartha Dugar

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Who knew that something so little like turning off the data when not in use because the screen is off can do so much for battery life!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ACE
reviews.comment: Best app   Impressed from the speed of Data Network Enable/Disable While locking/Unlocking Device
reviews.author: A Google User
